Smithy - Full-time - Senior Backend Engineer - London, UK

Smithy is a security pipeline orchestrator that makes it easy to automatically run any security tool and integrate it into a customer's organisation. We are an early stage startup based in central London. The job is onsite 4 days a week.

We are looking for an experienced backend engineer specialising in Go.

To apply, please see: https://smithy.homerun.co/senior-backend-engineer/en
